title: Luann de Lesseps cuts a chic figure in dark green satin coat with statement necklace at SiriusXM
text:
She recently revealed she rekindled a romance with her ex-boyfriend talent agent Rich Super.

And on Monday, Luann de Lesseps was spotted posing up a storm as she arrived to the SiriusXM Studios in New York City.

The 54-year-old Real Housewives of New York City star cut a chic figure in black bottoms with a matching top, adding a beaded teal necklace with a satin green jacket.

Elegant: Luann de Lesseps was spotted posing up a storm as she arrived to the SiriusXM Studios in New York City on Monday morning

Luann showcased her slim form in skintight black bottoms, adding a coordinating fitted top and boots.

She layered on a knee-grazing silky deep green jacket that she opted to wear open; Luann continued with her love for green with a bold teal colored beaded necklace.

Luann finished off her chic ensemble with several rings to round off her look; she styled her short dark brunette tresses around her, opting for a deep side part.

The brunette kept her makeup, rocking neutral lips with a touch of rosy blush on her cheekbones.

Focused: The 54-year-old Real Housewives of New York City star cut a chic figure in black bottoms with a matching top, adding a beaded teal necklace with a satin green jacket

Luann also posed inside the studios ahead of her appearance on The Jenny McCarthy Show on SiriusXM.

She posed next to Jenny herself, who donned a black and white patterned top with coordinating bottoms and a cardigan.

Jenny rocked her blonde tresses in curls while opting for smokey eye makeup and pink glossed lips.

Beaming: Luann also posed inside the studios ahead of her appearance on The Jenny McCarthy Show on SiriusXM

Focused: Luann finished off her chic ensemble with several rings to round off her look

Her visit to the SiriusXM show comes after she revealed is back together with her ex-boyfriend Rich Super.

She told TMZ that she and the talent agent have a 'strong connection.'

The duo were first linked together in July 2018 when he had filed for divorce from his wife; Rich and Luann however had split before her rehab stint.

The duo had sparked reconciliation rumors earlier this month after being spotted together several times.

Rich is Luann's first serious relationship since she split from ex-husband Tom D’Agostino in 2017.

Luann's revelation comes after she exclusively told DailyMail.com in August that she's looking forward to the future after a challenging few years.

The reality star admitted that she is relieved to finally be off a one-year probation sentence stemming from her drunken arrest at a hotel in Palm Beach, Florida on Christmas Eve in 2017.
